content.text: For DBaaS customers, who request services frequently, the marketplace enhancement, is a change in the user interface that will provide a better experience and less confusion, unlike the actual marketplace our solution will be user friendly and intuitive.
All DBaaS services will be found under the same form.
The form fill in will be intuitive and will not require personal assistance.
I am guided through the request.
I do not have to stop and go away to find information from somewhere else.
I can submit the request quickly.
As a DBaaS customer, I want to:
Select DBaaS from the Digital Marketplace.
Select my IT service from a list. This will also display the name of the service owner.
Select my application deployment from a list.
Enter a description of my request in a free-form text box.
Submit my request (this will create a RITM).
Both the IT service owner and I receive confirmation of request.
IT service owner receives an approval request.
IT service owner approves the request (this will create an SC task as a child of the RITM).
Both the IT service owner and I receive confirmation of approval and RITM ticket number.
See the request published in the Digital Marketplace.
Assign the task to a DBaaS support engineer. The engineer should have privileges to edit and close the task.

content.text: As a <type-of-user-persona>, I want <some-goal>, so that <some-reason-why>.

Identify specific user tasks, functions or business processes that must be in place. A functional criterion might be “A user is able to access a list of available reports.” A non-functional criterion might be “Edit buttons and Workflow buttons comply with the Site Button Design.”

Identify specific non-functional conditions the implementation must meet, such as design elements. A non-functional criterion might be “Edit buttons and Workflow buttons comply with the Site Button Design.”
